quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: That brain of mine is something more than merely mortal; as time will show.

quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee
quotes.quote: The Web does not just connect machines, it connects people.

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: The most dangerous phrase in the language is, 'We've always done it this way.'

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton
quotes.quote: There was no time to be polite. We had to get the job done.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.

quotes.author: John McCarthy
quotes.quote: As soon as it works, no one calls it AI anymore.

quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra
quotes.quote: Simplicity is a prerequisite for reliability.

quotes.author: Barbara Liskov
quotes.quote: The key to building a successful system is to make it easy to use.

quotes.author: Robert Noyce
quotes.quote: Don't be encumbered by history, just go out and do something wonderful.

quotes.author: Marissa Mayer
quotes.quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that's how you grow.

quotes.author: Jeff Dean
quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: I am more than a mathematician; I am a poet.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: A computer would deserve to be called intelligent if it could deceive a human into believing that it was human.

quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee
quotes.quote: The Web is more a social creation than a technical one.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: If you are born poor it's not your mistake, but if you die poor it's your mistake.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: I'm not a visionary. I'm just a guy who likes to code.
